name: luanti_ide_helper
title: Luanti IDE Helper
short_description: Precise IDE autocompletion and documentation with accurate type signatures and API definitions.
long_description:
Package for developers providing precise autocompletion and documentation for Luanti (Minetest) API in various IDEs.

> ### ⚠️ DO NOT INSTALL THIS MOD

This package is intended for developers only. For complete installation instructions and IDE configuration, please visit [our GitHub repository](https://github.com/Voxrame/luanti-ide-helper).
